name: VanEck Vectors Gold Miners ETF
description: The VanEck Vectors Gold Miners ETF (GDX) is an exchange-traded fund that seeks to replicate the performance of the NYSE Arca Gold Miners Index. Launched in 2006, GDX provides investors with exposure to a diversified portfolio of publicly traded companies that are involved in the gold mining industry. The fund includes large, mid, and small-cap gold mining companies, allowing for a broad representation of the sector. GDX aims to capture the performance of the gold mining sector, which can be influenced by factors such as gold prices, mining production, and geopolitical events. The ETF serves as a way for investors to gain access to gold mining equities without having to invest directly in individual stocks. Gold mining stocks are often viewed as a hedge against inflation and currency fluctuations, making GDX a popular choice for investors looking to diversify their portfolios. The fund is managed by VanEck, a well-known investment management firm that specializes in thematic and sector-focused ETFs. With low expense ratios and a transparent structure, GDX has become one of the largest and most liquid gold mining ETFs in the market.
